item.title: JWTs Explained Like a Hotel Keycard: The Dance Between Access and Refresh Tokens
item.author: Budi Yanto
item.description: The hotel keycard analogy changed how I see authentication — access tokens for quick access, refresh tokens for long-term security. A perfect balance of speed and safety.

item.title: How I Stopped Forgetting to Encode Passwords — Thanks to MapStruct
item.author: Budi Yanto
item.description: I used to rely on memory to call passwordEncoder.encode() — until I made password encoding automatic with MapStruct. Now it happens safely by design.
